channel.title: Management on The Plone Expanse
channel.description: Recent content in Management on The Plone Expanse

item.title: Get a project imported into subversion and start working imediately on it
item.description: I managed to figure out how to beat one awkward piece of workflow when starting new project: I always start hacking on a project, then I notice that I haven't been working on a svn checkout (it's the chicken or the egg problem). So I need to do a svn import, delete my copy of the project, checkout the svn version and start hacking at my project again. This workaround is agravated, though, when working with buildouts.
